DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to assess the safety and tolerability of BMS-641988 once daily orally in Japanese patients with castration resistant prostate cancer
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study of BMS-641988 in Japanese Patients With Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with castrationresistant prostate cancer and serum testosterone â‰¤50 ng/dL progressive to current therapy who satisfy the inclusion and exclusion criteria
